name: Breakout - Shift
description:
Breakout - Shift is my interpretation of the classic brick breaker/breakout game: a game where you break bricks with a ball. Your task is to keep the ball in the playing field by repeatedly bouncing it back with the paddle you control.

Be mindful of the Shift-bricks though, they will shift the borders of the playing field and change the side(s) of the playing field you have to guard with your paddle!
